title: gqlgen Configuration
description: Configuration file for gqlgen code generation

schema.description: Where are all the schema files located? globs are supported

exec.description: Where should the generated server code go?

filename.description: Path to the generated file (required for single-file layout)

dir.description: Directory for generated files (required for follow-schema layout)

filename_template.description: Template for filenames (required for follow-schema layout)

shard_dir.description: Directory for generated split shard packages (only for split-packages layout)

shard_filename_template.description: Template for split shard filenames (only for split-packages layout)

worker_limit.description: Maximum number of goroutines in concurrency to use per child resolvers

model.description: Where should any generated models go?

resolver.description: Where should the resolver implementations go?

autobind.description: gqlgen will search for any type names in the schema in these go packages

models.description: Type mapping between the GraphQL and go type systems

struct_tag.description: Tag to use for model fields (e.g. json)

omit_slice_element_pointers.description: Turn on to use []Thing instead of []*Thing

omit_interface_checks.description: Turn on to omit Is<Name>() methods to interface and unions

omit_complexity.description: Turn on to skip generation of ComplexityRoot struct content and Complexity function

omit_gqlgen_file_notice.description: Turn on to not generate any file notice comments in generated files

omit_gqlgen_version_in_file_notice.description: Turn on to exclude the gqlgen version in the generated file notice

omit_root_models.description: Turn on to exclude root models such as Query and Mutation from the generated models file

omit_resolver_fields.description: Turn on to exclude resolver fields from the generated models file

struct_fields_always_pointers.description: Turn off to make struct-type struct fields not use pointers

resolvers_always_return_pointers.description: Turn off to make resolvers return values instead of pointers for structs

return_pointers_in_unmarshalinput.description: Turn on to return pointers instead of values in unmarshalInput

nullable_input_omittable.description: Wrap nullable input fields with Omittable

skip_validation.description: Set to speed up generation time by not performing a final validation pass

skip_mod_tidy.description: Set to skip running 'go mod tidy' when generating server code

call_argument_directives_with_null.description: Argument directives decorating a field with a null value will still be called

use_function_syntax_for_execution_contex.description: Use function syntax for execution context instead of receiver methods

go_build_tags.description: Set build tags that will be used to load packages

go_build_flags.description: Set additional build flags passed to go/packages while loading packages

go_initialisms.description: Set to modify the initialisms regarded for Go names
